full_title: The Party Never Ends by Juice WRLD
title: The Party Never Ends

description.plain:
The first track on Juice WRLD’s “The Party Never Ends” sets the tone for his final album, featuring Juice’s signature introspective style, blending themes of partying, suspenseful melodies and personal struggle.

The song is a remix of his unreleased track “I See In The Dark,” the track’s structure was confirmed by Juice’s engineer Max Lord on March 17, 2024 via an Instagram post reply:

“I SEE IN THE DARK” not Oxy in the dark, (if you even listened to the words) was shortened to 50 seconds over a year ago for the INTRO. […]

embed_content: Read “The Party Never Ends” by Juice WRLD on Genius
recording_location: Intro & Chorus: Rented Estate Recording Studio, Bermuda Dunes, CA; Outro: Electric Feel Recording Studio, West Hollywood, Los Angeles, CA

43 ContributorsTranslationsEspañolУкраїнськаРусский (Russian)The Party Never Ends LyricsThe first track on Juice WRLD’s “The Party Never Ends” sets the tone for his final album, featuring Juice’s signature introspective style, blending themes of partying, suspenseful melodies and personal… Read More 
Set the stage
As soon as he hits, set the stage, that's when he carry
When the beat drops though, pssh, shit, it's gonna sound lit
Get your cellphone light up right now, put it up
Only cellphone lights, please
If you fuck with Juice WRLD, put it up a little bit higher
If you love Juice WRLD, put it up a little bit higher
If you fuck with Juice WRLD, raise your lights right now please
This show, niggas is not performin' like this no more, bro, like
These are the tickets? Fuck rent, fuck my landlord, fuck everything, nigga, Juice WRLD, nigga, I'm telling you
I said it first, the party never ends
Yeah

I see in the dark (In the dark, yeah), yeah
Perky tearin' me apart (Tear me apart, yeah), yeah
Tell them drugs to play they part (Play they part, play they part), yeah
Let the party start (Let the fucking party start, yeah), hah
I see in the dark (In the dark, yeah), yeah
Perky tearin' me apart, part (Tearing me apart, yeah), yeah
Tell them drugs to play they part (Playin' they partmotherfuckin' part, yeah), hah
Relax and let the party start (Yeah, yeah), yeah

(In the dark, yeah, yeah)
I said it first, the party never ends (Never ends, yeah, yeah), yeah
Relax and let the party start (Yeah, yeah)
(Yeah, yeah, yeah)
I know you had your ways for a couple of days
They say life is a book, well, I am turning the page
I'm not looking back at it at all, I'm gone
I'ma see you on the other side, yeah, yeah
(I said it first, the party never ends)
I'ma see you on the other side, yeah, yeah
I said it first, the party never ends
I'ma see you on the other side, yeah, yeah
